Ad says this shirt is 98% COTTON 2% Polyester.  IT IS NOT.  This shirt is made from a cotton blend that may be mixed with plastic.  The material is stiff and may require multiple washings with liquid fabric softener to get it to be COMFORTABLE.  As previously reported the shirt does wrinkle easily, but rubbing it makes the wrinkles less annoying.  The small checks in the cuff and color are another annoyance.  The contras does NOT add to the look of the shirt and is in conflict with shirt shadow diamond pattern. ONE MORE THING.  This shirt DOES NOT HAVE A POCKET.  I think it is time the women's blouse makers stopped trying to make men's dress shirts.  A pocket is a customary item in any quality men's DRESS shirt.  Over priced for the material and design.  Hope that helps.

5’9” 195# average body size, I do not have a big ole gut.  I bought a large. One each of the light blue and the dark blue. Right out of the box they both were about 1” short in the arms. Which would been ok. I normally wear my sleeves rolled up. 🤷‍♂️ I really like how it fit around the waist. Was not tight but didn’t not look like I was wearing a trash bag around me. So I washed them. Hoping they would not of shrunk…. They are 100% cotton. They shrink a fair amount. The arms are now about 3” short. The waist is form fitting now. Just not possible to wear. I should have gotten an XL but then would have probably had a trash bag around the waist. So I think I’ll just go to the store and try on shirts. Cause that was an expensive mistake. They seem to be of good quality. But not quite the fit I wanted after the wash. All in all worth the money if 1 you can get your size right 2 don’t mind a bag fit once you get them large enough. OH, and the collar did wrinkle really bad. If you want to look out together you will definitely have to iron the collar after washing.

Everything from this brand is two sizes smaller than listed. 3x fits like a XL. I'm slightly bigger than a typical 2x and 3x can be a bit large. These shirts barely fit on my arms and 4-6 inches from being able to button. It's like a child's shirt. I ordered 2 styles and both are the same. Also, after washing they are incredibly wrinkled. Can't even fix with an iron. The collar and all edge material is curled/not flat. The material is stiff. Feels like contact paper. I wouldn't pay $5 for this garbage.

Now I love this store, but out of all the purchases I've made this was the worst one. The material feels rough like paper, and it can't be ironed. After washing it, it came out so wrinkled that I couldn't iron it, or wear it again.

评论概述: One Time Use, Shrinks Quickly, Does not Stretch, Highly Prone to Wrinkles, Do you wear Newspapers?
评论详情: This is a one time use dress shirt, no joke. The moment you wash it it gets extremely wrinkled. Do not, and I repeat, do not throw this in the dryer on wrinkle free mode, because it will shrink like nothing you have ever seen before. I am 6'4 @ 175 lbs with long lanky arms and this now fits me like a toddler. The material is comparable to a newspaper, its thin and feels like paper. Even before washing when it was brand new, the shirt was very short and barely tucked in under a belt. Save your money and buy a dress shirt from Kohls or JC Penny, because this one is a complete waste of money.
